trans-unit.source: Describes objects that contain both a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that may be stored at that location.
trans-unit.target: 描述同時包含位置的 Managed 指標和可能儲存於該位置之型別的 Runtime 表示的物件。

trans-unit.source: A typed reference is a type/value combination used for varargs and other support.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考是用於 varargs 和其他支援的類型/值組合。

trans-unit.source: `TypedReference` is a built-in value type that can be used for parameters and local variables.
trans-unit.target: `TypedReference` 是可以用於參數和區域變數的內建實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Arrays of `TypedReference` objects cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 陣列`TypedReference`無法建立物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following call is invalid:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列呼叫無效：

trans-unit.source: The object with which to compare the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Checks if this object is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 檢查這個物件是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object is equal to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件和指定的物件相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法尚未實作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of this object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code of this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The value whose target's type is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其目標型別的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the target of the specified <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 的目標型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the target of the specified <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 的目標型別。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the field described by the first element of <c>flds</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含由 <c>flds</c> 的第一元素所描述的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A list of field descriptions where each element describes a field that contains the field described by the succeeding element.
trans-unit.target: 欄位描述的清單，其中的每個元素會描述某個欄位，而該欄位則又包含由接續元素所描述的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Each described field must be a value type.
trans-unit.target: 每一個描述的欄位都必須是實值型別。

trans-unit.source: The field descriptions must be <see langword="RuntimeFieldInfo" /> objects supplied by the type system.
trans-unit.target: 欄位描述必須是由型別系統所提供的 <see langword="RuntimeFieldInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Makes a <see langword="TypedReference" /> for a field identified by a specified object and list of field descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 對由指定物件和欄位描述清單所識別的欄位產生 <see langword="TypedReference" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> for the field described by the last element of <paramref name="flds" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="flds" /> 的最後一個元素所描述之欄位的 <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TypedReference.MakeTypedReference%2A> method returns a typed reference to some terminal field, where the `target` parameter contains the field described by the first element of `flds`, the field described by the first element of `flds` contains the field described by the second element of `flds`, and so on until the terminal field is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypedReference.MakeTypedReference%2A>方法會傳回具類型的參考至一些終端機的欄位，其中`target`參數包含的第一個元素所描述之欄位`flds`，第一個項目所描述之欄位`flds`包含欄位第二個元素所描述`flds`，直到達到終端機的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫端被授與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，如果非公用成員的授權集僅限於呼叫者的授與集或子集合類別。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> or <paramref name="flds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 或 <paramref name="flds" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="flds" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flds" /> 的項目是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="flds" /> array has no elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flds" /> 陣列沒有元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="flds" /> is not a <see langword="RuntimeFieldInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flds" /> 的元素不是 <see langword="RuntimeFieldInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly" /> or <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic" /> property of an element of <paramref name="flds" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flds" /> 的元素的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic" /> 屬性是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Parameter <paramref name="target" /> does not contain the field described by the first element of <paramref name="flds" />, or an element of <paramref name="flds" /> describes a field that is not contained in the field described by the succeeding element of <paramref name="flds" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數 <paramref name="target" /> 不包含由 <paramref name="flds" /> 的第一元素所描述的欄位，或是 <paramref name="flds" /> 的元素描述不包含於 <paramref name="flds" /> 的接續元素所描述之欄位中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The field described by an element of <paramref name="flds" /> is not a value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flds" /> 的元素所描述的欄位不是實值型別。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The target of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的目標。

trans-unit.source: The value to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to a <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換成 <see langword="TypedReference" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method always throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TypedReference" /> for which the type handle is requested.
trans-unit.target: 型別控制代碼所要求的 <see langword="TypedReference" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the internal metadata type handle for the specified <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 的內部中繼資料型別控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The internal metadata type handle for the specified <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 的內部中繼資料型別控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TypedReference" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <see langword="TypedReference" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see langword="TypedReference" /> to an <see langword="Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 轉換成 <see langword="Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> converted from a <see langword="TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see langword="TypedReference" /> 轉換而來的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This might be a boxing operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 boxing 作業。
